General.Name: EasyJet PLC
General.Description: easyJet plc operates as a low-cost airline carrier in Europe. It also engages in the sale of holiday packages; aircraft trading and leasing; development of building projects; financing and insurance business; and tour operator activities. As of September 30, 2022, it operated 320 aircrafts, 988 routes, and 153 airports. easyJet plc was founded in 1995 and is based in Luton, the United Kingdom.

9.Name: Mr. Garry  Wilson
9.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of easyJet Holidays
